hero.title: Quantum Vendetta: Top-Down 2D Shooter
hero.description: Dive into a world of intense action and strategy. Blast through waves of enemies in this thrilling top-down 2D shooter.

action.title: Fast-paced Action
action.description: Experience non-stop excitement with rapid-fire gameplay.

strategy.title: Strategic Depth
strategy.description: Plan your moves and outsmart your enemies to survive.

updates.title: Regular Updates
updates.description: New content and features added frequently to keep the game fresh.

powerups.title: Power-ups
powerups.description: Collect and use various power-ups to enhance your abilities.

about.title: About Quantum Vendetta
about.description: Quantum Vendetta is a thrilling top-down 2D shooter that combines fast-paced action with strategic gameplay. Developed by a passionate team of indie game developers, our mission is to deliver an unforgettable gaming experience that keeps you coming back for more.

features.2: Diverse enemy types and challenging bosses
